name: Sagittarius
description:
Sagittarius is a classic side scrolling space shoot'em up in a modern take. In this epic space game it's up to you to save our solar system from destruction. Fly alone or with a friend in a local multiplayer co-op game.

Weapons & Power-ups

Chose to upgrade your ship with either heavier armor or faster engine to suit your style of play. Overcome your enemies with the help of a wide arsenal of powerful weapons & power-ups!

Minions & Bosses

Test your powers against a wide selection of minions and engage in epic boss fights!

Hard mode

Is the game too easy? Try the impossible hard mode!

Local multiplayer co-op

Enjoy the full game with a friend in local multiplayer co-op. NOTE: Two (2) controllers are required to play a local multiplayer game.
